text: Gideon Patt (; 22 February 1933 â€“ 26 April 2020) was an Israeli politician. He was born in Jerusalem. Patt was a member of the Knesset from 1970 to 1996. He was a Minister of Industry from 1979 to 1984 and Tourism in 1981 and again from 1988 to 1992. He was a member of Likud. Patt died on 26 April 2020 in Jerusalem at the age of 87.Former MK Gideon Patt passes away at 87 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Likud politicians Category:Politicians from Jerusalem
title: Gideon Patt
